subject: SIMSONN Pro Plus Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

Is it possible to order the pedal plates of the Pro Plus X ?

Many thanks in advance.
Regards,

José Alves

conversations.body_text: Hello, you may place your order via this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals

Hello,
on this site I can only order the Full package, I already have the Pro Plus
Pedals, what I want is only the new X pedal plates, is it possible to order?

Many thanks
José Alves

On Thu, Sep 4, 2025 at 3:37 AM service@simsonn.com
